item.title: Trying out snapd on Arch Linux
item.description: The past few weeks I have been listening to all of the buzz about Ubuntu “snaps”, but I just recently decided to try this new technology out. Snapd Install and Setup I decided to install snapd on my small netbook (Abra), which is running Arch Linux. So, installing snapd was as easy as running: pacaur -S snapd Now, I use pacaur so that I can install packages from Arch Linux’s main repos, as well as the AUR.
